title: Adaptive Machine Learning-Based Robotic Emotion Recognition Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Machine Learning Concepts and Proficiency in Programming Languages (e.g., Python)
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals requiring practical interest in human-robot interaction technologies.

learning_goals: Learners can design a system that recognizes new facial expression data with over 85% accuracy using an SVM-based classification model
Learners can implement methods to adapt to new data while maintaining the accuracy of existing models by applying online learning algorithms
Learners can explain a process for efficiently retraining mispredicted samples using the Support Vector Tracking Learning (SVPL) technique
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
